topicTitle: Two ways to have more fun in life:

posts.postText:
Passive aggressive door holding game: See if you can make an innocent stranger hurry more than 15 feet while you hold the door

Courty trot: This one is for drivers. The next time you are driving along a storefront and you see somebody who wants to cross you roll up to them then suddenly stop. If you do it right then they will make a sort of false start. The people act like they are walking faster (to be courteous) but they still actually walk their normal pace. Funny to watch xD
Theres plenty of ways to have more fun on airplanes too, google it.
Same thing if you're laying on the couch and you're canoodling yourself.

>> Next airplane...Jihad.wav :Dâ€‰
